pcomponents

Class Condenser

  • java.lang.Object
    • pcomponents.PlantComponent
      • pcomponents.Condenser
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Condenser
extends PlantComponent
    Condenser class is a plant component that takes steam as an input and converts some of the steam inside it to water. It's health goes down when the internal temperature and/or pressure's value is higher than the maximum one. If the health is 0 or lower, the game is over.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • Condenser

        public Condenser(Pump coolantPump)
        Constructor for Condenser. The created Condenser never fails randomly and is pressured.

      • getWaterVolume

        public int getWaterVolume()
        Return the current water volume inside the condenser.
        Returns:
        the current water volume inside the condenser.

      • updateWaterVolume

        public void updateWaterVolume(int amount)
        Updates the amount of water in the condenser.
        Parameters:
        amount - amount of water to add to the total in the condenser.

      • getSteamVolume

        public int getSteamVolume()
        Return the current steam volume inside the condenser.
        Returns:
        the current steam volume inside the condenser.

      • updateSteamVolume

        public void updateSteamVolume(int amount)
        Updates the amount of steam in the condenser. Also stores the amount of steam into the condenser for this step and as such should not be called more than once per step. amount can be negative and will be when steam is condensed into water.
        Parameters:
        amount - the amount of steam to add to the volume.

      • getHealth

        public int getHealth()
        Return the current health of the condenser.
        Returns:
        the current health of the condenser.

      • getCoolantPump

        public Pump getCoolantPump()

      • updateState

        public void updateState()
        Updates the state of the condenser. Updates the temperature, condense some steam to water, updates the pressure and damage the condenser if it has to.
        Specified by:
        updateState in class PlantComponent

      • checkFailure

        public boolean checkFailure()
        Checks if the condenser fails. If the health is below 0 and the method returns true, the PlantController will detect a game over state.
        Overrides:
        checkFailure in class PlantComponent
        Returns:
        true if health is below 0

      • updateTemperature

        private void updateTemperature()
        Updates the temperature. Calculates a new value for the temperature based on heating because of steam flowing in the condenser and cooling.

      • updatePressure

        private void updatePressure()
        Updates the pressure. Calculates a new value for the pressure.

      • heating

        private int heating(int steamTemperature,
          int steamVolumeIn)
        Calculates the increase in temperature based upon the temperature and volume of steam coming into the condenser.
        Parameters:
        steamTemperature - temperature of steam coming into the condenser
        steamVolumeIn - amount of steam that has come into the condenser in the last step.
        Returns:
        amount of temperature increase for this step.

      • cooldown

        private int cooldown()
        Returns COOLDOWN_PER_STEP constant as the pump pumping coolant into the condenser is always on full. Will obviously not try to cool the condenser past the temperature of the coolant.
        Returns:
        amount of temperature decrease for this step.

      • cooldownPerStep

        private int cooldownPerStep()

      • condenseSteam

        private void condenseSteam()
        Not very physics accurate, but it provides a reasonable model of the behaviour of steam condensing.

      • checkIfDamaging

        private void checkIfDamaging()
        Damages the condenser if appropriate. Damages the condenser if the current temperature is above the max temperature and if the current pressure is above the max pressure.

      • damageCondenser

        private void damageCondenser()
        Damages the condenser. Lowers the health by HEALTH_CHANGE_WHEN_DAMAGING.
